description: On a nearly deserted sun-soaked beach, Matthew Rush encounters Brendan Austin and Steve Hogan enjoying some speedo-stretching surfside play. As the surf pounds the shore, this lusty threesome regroups and Matthew takes his turn filling Brendan's ass.  As the intensity increases, each sun-touched stud hits the peak of satiety and delivers his load.
title: Good As Gold, Scene #03
